Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are talking about Ben Phillips in the latest post concerning #auspol and #RaiseTheRate. Netizens are buzzing about the Economic Inclusion Cttee member's well-written piece that sheds light on how the government has a chance to tackle significant social injustice and change the fortunes of vulnerable groups in a nation otherwise deemed wealthy. It's a post that's got everyone talking so be sure to check it out!
